title: GT Grade powers up Amp, Bolt & Current light, affordable gravel e-bikes in Europe
content:
European e-gravel riders get another few affordable options with GT’s new lightweight alloy Grade Power series gravel e-bikes. Starting with their popular, budget-friendly aluminum Grade gravel bike which got a big tire overhaul two summers ago, now GT has dropped a small battery into the downtube and added a light ebikemotion hub motor out back.
